class.name: NavigationServer3D
class.brief_description: Server interface for low-level 3D navigation access
class.description: NavigationServer3D is the server responsible for all 3D navigation. It creates the agents, maps, and regions for navigation to work as expected. This keeps tracks of any call and executes them during the sync phase. This means that you can request any change to the map, using any thread, without worrying.

method.name: agent_create
method.description: Creates the agent.

method.name: agent_is_map_changed
method.description: Returns true if the map got changed the previous frame.

method.name: agent_set_callback
method.description: Callback called at the end of the RVO process.

method.name: agent_set_map
method.description: Puts the agent in the map.

method.name: agent_set_max_neighbors
method.description: Sets the maximum number of other agents the agent takes into account in the navigation. The larger this number, the longer the running time of the simulation. If the number is too low, the simulation will not be safe.

method.name: agent_set_max_speed
method.description: Sets the maximum speed of the agent. Must be positive.

method.name: agent_set_neighbor_dist
method.description: Sets the maximum distance to other agents this agent takes into account in the navigation. The larger this number, the longer the running time of the simulation. If the number is too low, the simulation will not be safe.

method.name: agent_set_position
method.description: Sets the position of the agent in world space.

method.name: agent_set_radius
method.description: Sets the radius of the agent.

method.name: agent_set_target_velocity
method.description: Sets the new target velocity.

method.name: agent_set_time_horizon
method.description: The minimal amount of time for which the agent's velocities that are computed by the simulation are safe with respect to other agents. The larger this number, the sooner this agent will respond to the presence of other agents, but the less freedom this agent has in choosing its velocities. Must be positive.

method.name: agent_set_velocity
method.description: Sets the current velocity of the agent.

method.name: free
method.description: Destroy the RID

method.name: map_create
method.description: Create a new map.

method.name: map_get_cell_size
method.description: Returns the map cell size.

method.name: map_get_closest_point
method.description: Returns the point closest to the provided [code]point[/code] on the navigation mesh surface.

method.name: map_get_closest_point_normal
method.description: Returns the normal for the point returned by [method map_get_closest_point].

method.name: map_get_closest_point_owner
method.description: Returns the owner region RID for the point returned by [method map_get_closest_point].

method.name: map_get_closest_point_to_segment
method.description: Returns the closest point between the navigation surface and the segment.

method.name: map_get_edge_connection_margin
method.description: Returns the edge connection margin of the map.

method.name: map_get_path
method.description: Returns the navigation path to reach the destination from the origin.

method.name: map_get_up
method.description: Returns the map's up direction.

method.name: map_is_active
method.description: Returns true if the map is active.

method.name: map_set_active
method.description: Sets the map active.

method.name: map_set_cell_size
method.description: Set the map cell size used to weld the navigation mesh polygons.

method.name: map_set_edge_connection_margin
method.description: Set the map edge connection margein used to weld the compatible region edges.

method.name: map_set_up
method.description: Sets the map up direction.

method.name: process
method.description: Process the collision avoidance agents. The result of this process is needed by the physics server, so this must be called in the main thread. Note: This function is not thread safe.

method.name: region_bake_navmesh
method.description: Bakes the navigation mesh.

method.name: region_create
method.description: Creates a new region.

method.name: region_set_map
method.description: Sets the map for the region.

method.name: region_set_navmesh
method.description: Sets the navigation mesh for the region.

method.name: region_set_transform
method.description: Sets the global transformation for the region.

method.name: set_active
method.description: Control activation of this server.
